website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but it's a high-protein formula that's designed to help overweight dogs lose weight.
pros: Recipe uses a high level of protein along with high fiber levels to promote weight loss in the animal
Includes ingredients to help the dog maintain healthy joints and bones as it loses weight
Dogs will feel fuller, so they won't tend to eat as often
Specialty formula that's safe to use
cons: Requires a veterinary authorization for purchase

customer_reviews.title: ... Satiety Support Small Dog Dry Dog Food has been wonderful for our miniature poodle
customer_reviews.text: Royal Canin Veterinary Diet Canine Satiety Support Small Dog Dry Dog Food has been wonderful for our miniature poodle. Flash is very allergic to so many foods and has a lot of gastrointestinal issues, it has really helped in that aspect. Royal Canin has also helped us with Flashs weight issue, as he was about 3 lbs overweight, because it satisfies his hunger and yet doesn't cause him to gain weight. He also seems to have more energy, I don't know if it's because of the food or the loss of weight but either way it's because of the Royal Canin so we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Success! Dachshund is losing weight!
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund has lost 3 pounds on her first bag! No loss of energy, coat is glossy and healthy. Highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: LISA O.

customer_reviews.title: Been giving this food to my pug for 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Been giving this food to my pug for 2 months now given she has weight and thyroid issues. She has lost almost 2 pounds; energy is up and cost is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: A dog food that satisfied my dog's appetite and helped her lose weight.
customer_reviews.text: We had a overweight nine year old toy Yorkie. She has been overweight since she was neutered. I've tried different dog foods but she was left very hungry. Our vet suggested this dog food which satisfies her so she isn't feeling hungry all the time. Within three months, she is down to her target weight set by my vet. My Yorkie has bad knee joints so getting her weight under control was so important.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl carobine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a higehly nutritious product that we buy for our doggie with digestive challenges. It enhances her regularity and she enjoys eating the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jim Singer

customer_reviews.title: Like Weight Watchers for Canines
customer_reviews.text: My two cocker spaniels who are both overweight, are also very food oriented. Our ver said one needs to lose 4-5 lbs, the other needs to lose 1-2 lbs. They love be the diet food, and always want more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a good choice for dogs with sensitivities or weight issues. It was highly recommended by our family vet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia V.

customer_reviews.title: Good food for the pup!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes the food and it helps his weight stay steady.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Strong

customer_reviews.title: He eats better now and has no gastrointestinal issues
customer_reviews.text: My Shorkey was starting to gain some weight, so I tired this, and he loves it! He eats better now and has no gastrointestinal issues. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: P. GONSALVES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best for our older dogs. Same price as going to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: SBriggs

customer_reviews.title: My dogs were on the heavier side, once they ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs were on the heavier side, once they switched to this food they lost weight gradually. All three are now the appropriate weight for their size.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great Option
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs, including one very picky eater. They both love this food! Wish I would've found this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rotenkolber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkie has been eating this food for a couple of years and loves it w every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
